duties_responsibilities.duty: Fabricate and repair orthotic and/or prosthetic devices according to Company quality and quantity standards.
Ordering and receiving, and other inventory tasks as assigned.
Maintain a safe, clean and orderly work environment.
Adhere to all safety regulations and Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA) requirements.
Perform other related duties as required.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED. 1 year of related experience preferred. Will train.
